reuters.title: AMERICAN VARIETY ACQUISITION PACT TERMINATED
reuters.body: <American Variety International Inc> said its agreement to acquire <First National Entertainment Corp> has been terminated because First National was not able to fulfill terms of the agreement. It said due to protracted negotiations with First National, several American Variety divisions were inoperative in 1986. American Variety said it is reevaluating its record and tape library for possible conversion to compact discs. Reuter 
